titleInfo.title: Billie Stein and Her Harmony Girls Band

physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back: ''Billie Stein's Orchestra, Billy playing trumpet at left, about 1925. Donor Mrs. Billie Stein, #193.'' On envelope: ''#193 Billie Stein's Orchestra, 1925.''

mods.abstract: Billie (Lillian) Stein poses with members of her Harmony Girls Orchestra. All five female members are dressed in pirate costumes with their instruments. Billie Stein on the left playing her trumpet. Billie Stein started her own all-girls band at the age of 14 and traveled throughout the United States performing on her trumpet.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
